sect1.title: Accessing the Program
sect1.para:
Gpe-Today is accessable in the main application screen. To access it tap on the summary icon.
GPE Main Screen

listitem.para: This application allows you to view your appointments for today, along with any items you have on your todolist.
To add content here simply schedule appointments in Gpe-Calendar or add a(n) item(s) to Gpe-Todo.
